Package fi.abo.kogni.soile2.http_server.auth

Class SoileIDBasedAuthorizationHandler

java.lang.Object
fi.abo.kogni.soile2.http_server.auth.SoileIDBasedAuthorizationHandler
public class SoileIDBasedAuthorizationHandler extends Object
Authorization handling for ID based auth. This is for any end-points with IDs (like tasks/experiments/projects/study) and allows handling those based on the appropriate Target collection to check authorizations against.
Author:
Thomas Pfau

      client - the MongoClient to use for db access

  • Method Details

    • checkMultipleFullAuthorizations

      public boolean checkMultipleFullAuthorizations(io.vertx.ext.auth.User user, List<String> IDs, boolean AdminAllowed)
      Check if the given user has full authorization for the given list of IDs
      Parameters:
      user - The user to check
      IDs - the ids to check
      AdminAllowed - whether it would be sufficient if the user is an admin.
      Returns:
      whether the user has access to everything or not

    • checkIsPrivate

      public io.vertx.core.Future<Boolean> checkIsPrivate(String id)
      Check whether the object with the given ID is private.
      Parameters:
      id - the id to check
      Returns:
      whether the given ID is private

    • authorize

      public io.vertx.core.Future<Void> authorize(io.vertx.ext.auth.User user, String id, boolean adminAllowed, SoileAuthorization.PermissionType requiredAccess)
      Check, whether the given user has authorization to access the given resource based on the required SoileAuthorization.PermissionType
      Parameters:
      user - The user to check the authorization for
      id - the ID of the object to check
      adminAllowed - whether admin access overrides the access restrictions
      requiredAccess - what the required level of access is (higher access overrides lower access).
      Returns:
      A successful future if the user has the given authorization.
